original: syād māta vacaso vandano'tha gargāḥ samīritāḥ || 84 ||

āṇī cayāḥ ca mūḍhāḥ ca bādhyāḥ kācākṣataḥ matāḥ

original: kāśivājā ime jñeyā āyāsyā gautamā matāḥ |

original: ete ca gautamā jñeyāstriyārṣeyā iti smṛtāḥ || 97 ||
analyzed: ete ca gautamāḥ jñeyāḥ triyārṣeyāḥ iti smṛtāḥ

ūrjāyanāḥ ime jñeyāḥ gautamāḥ dvijasattamāḥ
pañca ārṣeyāḥ tu āṅgirasa aucathyau kākṣīvataḥ tatas

original: kaumāṇḍo gautamaḥ pañca tato dīrghatamā matāḥ || 100 ||
analyzed: kaumāṇḍaḥ gautamaḥ pañca tatas dīrghatamāḥ matāḥ
pañca ārṣeyāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ tu eke eva ca sammatāḥ
āṅgirasa aucathya kākṣīvatāḥ gautamāḥ iti api
tatas dīrghatamaḥ ca iti paryāyāḥ pañca saṃmatāḥ
kāreṇupālayaḥ ca eva vāstavyāḥ ca udivāḥ tatas
bṛhadukthāḥ api pauñjiṣṭhāḥ rājagandhayaḥ iti api
auduñcāyana sajñāḥ ca ete kāreṇupālayaḥ
gautamāḥ te tri yārṣeyāḥ tu aṅgirāḥ gautamaḥ tatas
kāreṇu pāliḥ iti ete trayaḥ tu auśanasaḥ tatas
saha diṣṭāḥ praśasta ākhyāḥ surūpākṣā mahodarāḥ
vikaṃhataḥ subuddhyāḥ ca nihatāḥ ca guhāḥ iti
proktāḥ uśanasā ete triyārṣeyāḥ tu gautamāḥ
aṅgirāḥ gautamaḥ tu auśanasaḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ
saha diṣṭāḥ praśasta ākhyāḥ surūpa akṣāḥ mahā ojasaḥ
tathā eva vāmadevaḥ ca triya ārṣeyāḥ tu gautamāḥ
aṅgirāḥ gautamaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca iti trayaḥ tu ime
atrīn vakṣye samāsane teṣu ādau a trayaḥ matāḥ
bhojaḥ ca aditi saṃjñaḥ ca cāndrośīḥ pārvaḥ iti api
kāmaṅgulyaḥ ca śaivāḥ ca chagālāḥ chāgalāḥ tathā
